import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { IonPage, IonCard, IonCardHeader, IonCardTitle, IonCardSubtitle, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonBackButton, IonContent, IonTitle, IonButtons, IonTextarea, IonGrid, IonRow, IonCol, IonButton ,IonCardContent, IonLabel, IonItem, IonInput, IonFab, IonFabButton, IonIcon, IonImg, IonList, IonNote, } from '@ionic/react' import { add } from 'ionicons/icons' import { useCamera, availableFeatures } from '@ionic/react-hooks/camera'; import { CameraResultType } from '@capacitor/core' import { picData, createTable } from '../components/frontend/create-table' import { beansDataFileName, beansSettingsFileName } from '../components/objects/filenames' import { beansDefault } from '../components/objects/default-values' import { readSettings, readData, readPicture } from '../components/backend/data' import { store } from '../components/backend/store' const dataFileName = beansDataFileName export const ShowBeans = () => { const globalState = useContext(store) const { state } = globalState const data = state.beans.data const settings = state.beans.settings const picArray = state.beans.pics let res2 if(picArray.length > 0 && data.length > 0){ console.log('DATA:', data) console.log('DATA REVERSE', data.reverse()) console.log('DATA0:', data[0]) res2 = data.reverse().map((row, index1) => {settings.filter(setting => setting[1] === true).map((setting, index2) => <> { (index2 === 0) ? {setting[0]}:

{row[setting[0]]}

 {picArray[0][row.id] ? : } : <> {/**/} {setting[0]}:

{row[setting[0]]}

 {/**/} } )} {Object.keys(row)[1]}: {row[Object.keys(row)[1]]} ) } return ( Bohnen anzeigen {/**/} {res2} {/**/} ) }
